traffic signs.description: An obscured sign on the right side of the road, white with a visible border but the main symbol or text is not visible
traffic signs.explanation: It cannot be determined what the sign is indicating due to its obscurity, which requires cautious driving and attentiveness to other potential signage that might be clearer.

barriers.description: A barrier on the right side of the road, appears to be a small red and white striped railing
barriers.explanation: This barrier indicates a boundary or restricted area, possibly due to roadside works or to protect a drop-off, necessitating the ego car to stay to the left and avoid the barrier.

other objects.description: A large pile of dirt or debris on the right side of the road, just before the barrier
other objects.explanation: The presence of the debris could pose a hazard by narrowing the usable roadway and potentially causing damage if collided with. The ego car should reduce speed and maintain a safe distance from the debris.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic scene observed, there are no vehicles or vulnerable road users present. However, there is an obscured traffic sign on the right side of the road: white with a visible border, but due to the main symbol or text being indecipherable, its precise instructions cannot be determined. Because of its obscurity, the ego car must drive cautiously and stay alert for any other signage that might be more visible, for proper guidance.

Furthermore, there is a red and white striped railing barrier also on the right side of the road, indicating there is a boundary or restricted area ahead. This could potentially be due to roadside work or to protect against a drop-off. As a result, the autonomous vehicle must maintain a position to the left to avoid this barrier.

Additionally, a sizable pile of dirt or debris is situated on the right side of the road just prior to the barrier. Its presence requires careful driving as it narrows the drivable portion of the road and could inflict damage if struck. To ensure safety, the ego car should decelerate and maintain a considerable distance from this hazard. There are no traffic lights or traffic cones in this image.

1.description and explanation: A large boulder is present on the road. This poses an immediate obstruction and hazard to vehicles traveling on this path. In response, the driver of the ego car will need to stop or maneuver carefully around the obstruction, ensuring that it is safe to do so without colliding with the boulder or any oncoming traffic. As part of future driving behavior, the driver should also remain vigilant for any potential additional hazards that may be present due to the unstable terrain or further falling debris.

driving_suggestion: Proceed with caution, maintain a slower speed appropriate for the road conditions, stay alert for any hidden traffic signs and potential hazards, and keep a safe distance from the right side of the road due to the presence of debris and barriers.
